response.overview: The continuity of a discourse that multiplies its materiality. A woman enters the scene and traverses the frame, unaware that the boundaries of the frame become her own trap.  The continuity of the successive and excessive multiplicity of these women represents the memory that moves between the past and the future, in constant becoming. The transition from the different turns towards the homogeneous, and the feeling of sameness, of the identical, begins to grow. Space and movement, the voids in memory, are filled until they engulf everything, only to then empty out completely. The body becomes ephemeral, and the question of our existence takes on a revealing weight.  Super 8 film, digitally intervened.
response.title: Histéresis
